[center][font size=4]tt-rss Change Log[/font][/center] [font size=4]23-02-2017[/font] - Rebase to alpine linux and nginx. [font size=4]24-11-2015[/font] - Refresh Dependencies
Container.Name: tt-rss
Container.Description: Tiny Tiny RSS is an open source web-based news feed (RSS/Atom) reader and aggregator, designed to allow you to read news from any location, while feeling as close to a real desktop application as possible.[br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] Where tt-rss should store settings and configuration files[br]
Container.Overview: Tiny Tiny RSS is an open source web-based news feed (RSS/Atom) reader and aggregator, designed to allow you to read news from any location, while feeling as close to a real desktop application as possible.
